definition: branch/stem/stalk/CL:根[gen1]/to block/to hinder/(Tw) interesting, fresh, or amusing subject matter or scenario

sentences.english: Objective To treat acute myocardial infarction with cardiogenic shock by emegency PCI.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討急性心肌梗死合併心源性休克的搶救方法。

sentences.english: Effect of 1,6-fructose diphosphate in 119 cases of cerebral infarction.
sentences.chinese: 二磷酸果糖治療119例腦梗死患者的療效觀察。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the validity of decompressive hemicraniectomy of massive cerebral infarction.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討去骨辨減壓術治療大面積腦梗死的有效性。

sentences.english: Objective To probe into the effect of Jipailin on blood rheology in acute stage in cerebral infarction.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討吉派林對腦梗死急性期血液流變學的影響。

sentences.english: Besides , CT is insentive to corpus callosum infarction.
sentences.chinese: 另外CT對胼胝體梗死不敏感。

sentences.english: Infarct size was determined by TTC staining method.
sentences.chinese: TTC染色法檢測心肌梗死麪積。

sentences.english: To reconstruct the 3-dimensioanal image of heart and the region of myocardial ischemia from 2-dimensioanal tomogram of electron beam CT (EBCT).
sentences.chinese: 研究電子束CT心肌梗死部位及形態的三維圖象重建。
包膜下可見黃褐色梗死竈。

sentences.english: Conclusion:The effect of batroxobin in combined with edaravone to treat acute cerebral infarction patients is significant.
sentences.chinese: 巴曲酶聯合依達拉奉治療急性腦梗死的效果明顯。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effects of tongxinluo capsule on patients with convalescent brain infarction.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價通心絡膠囊在腦梗死康復期治療中的作用。

sentences.english: Four things in particular are the most sinister signs of a silent heart attack.
sentences.chinese: 四種症狀是心肌梗死病發的最危險的症狀。

sentences.english: The most of patients in cerebellar infarcts was great outcome.
sentences.chinese: 大部分小腦梗死患者預後尚好。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical and etiology characteristics of cerebral infarction in juvenile.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究青少年腦梗死的臨牀特徵及病因學特點。

sentences.english: Conclusion Sodium ozagrel is effective and safe in the treatment of acute progressive cerebral infarction.
sentences.chinese: 結論丹奧治療急性進展型腦梗死安全有效。

sentences.english: How to evaluate the relationship of between ARBs and myocardial infarction?
sentences.chinese: 如何看待ARB與心肌梗死的關係？

definition: basilar artery (central artery of the brain)
